title: ORRRRRRREEEEEEEEN
body: remember when maokai had 13% max health dmg on his w, well ornn now has 20% max health dmg on his w. So im just saying start playing him before it is to late

replies.body: Yep, total BS, I'm not sure what Riot's obsession is with tanks doing as much damage as carries, but I'm sick and tired of it, at the end of the day, you should only do damage if you build damage. (Unless you're Nasus)
